accessrestrict.head: Information about Access
accessrestrict.p: Access: There is a minimum of five business days required for paging Peter Frank's records.
Access: Mary Jane Parrine's files are currently unprocessed and not available.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Collection contains the files of Roberto G. Trujillo, curator for Mexican American collections, 1977-1996; Peter R. Frank, curator for Germanic collections, 1976-1990; Mary Jane Parrine, curator for French and Italian collections, 1979-1999; and Wojciech Zalewski, curator for Slavic and East European collections, circa 1970s-1999. Included are minutes, reports, grant files, correspondence, proposals, and other materials.
